articles.title: Epstein files latest: Marjorie Taylor Greene hits back at Trump as she repeats call for files release - BBC
articles.description: Ahead of a vote on the file release, the Republican congresswoman says the Epstein issue has "ripped Maga apart" (Trump's Make America Great Again movement).
articles.content:
Cai PigliucciReporting from Capitol Hill
Image caption, Democratic Representative Ro Khanna hugs Republican Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene
Many victims of Epstein have now spoken here, acros… [+857 chars]
